Name: Mimics the bots
About the game: What is Mimics the bots ? Mimics the bots is a fun little game to be played with friends. One player embodies a killer and the other the finder. The problem is that the killer has the same body as the villager. The killer will need to stealthily kill 4 bots to win the game within 10 minutes. The finder will only have 3 attempts to flush out the killer. To your bluffs!
